# Raw data storage #

All raw data MUST be stored on common server the O:\Nat_MBG-PMg\~Microbiome raw data\


1x folder per sequencing library using the naming convention:
Initials_date_experiment(short)


Along with the raw reads, manifest/metadata files must also be provided.
